content: the mountain and sew the bottom with the mattress st the side sts should stay exactly on the sides chart 1 @thiscosynest 3 bigger mountain on the circular needles for magic loop technique or dpn cast on 50 sts with color 1 yarn leaving a long tail for sewing the bottom join the knitting in the round divide sts evenly onto 2 needles 25 sts on each work 2 rnds in stockinette st all k sts highlight the first and 26th st side sts with markers from both sides 3rd round *k1 ssk k sts till there are 2 sts left to a marker k2tog* - 2 times to the end of the round 4-5th rnds all k sts repeat rnds 3-5 for 3 more times on the needles 34 sts 17 sts on each needle 15th round *k1 ssk k12 k2tog* - 2 times to the end of the round join color 2 thread and work 2 rnds of colorwork according to chart 2 after the colorwork cut color 1 and continue working only in color 2 yarn 18th round *k1 ssk k sts till there are 2 sts left to a marker k2tog* - 2 times to the end of the round 19-20th rnds all k sts repeat rnds 18-20th for 3 more time 30th round *k1 ssk k2 k2tog* - 2 times to the end of the round 31st round *k2tog* - to the end of the round there are 5 sts on the needles cut the yarn and pull it through the remaining open sts slightly stuff the knitting and sew the bottom with the mattress st the side sts should stay exactly on the sides chart 2 the pattern is for the personal use only copying selling or distributing of the pattern text or photos is prohibited @thiscosynest 4 find me in instagram @thiscosynest probably you´d be interested in my other patterns chalet sweater liana sweater sweet home sweater rosental sweater sweet home hat my other patterns are available on ravelry or etsy
